Body:
Nasals:

I must answer the question but I am not sure how to understand it... The question is: why nasals both can and cannot be treated as stop consonants? I thought that nasals cannot be stop consonants almost by definition, now I am so confused!
Title: Are nasals stop consonants?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe:
Travelling armchair linguist.

Never studied in an institution but read books and web with probably more breadth than depth.

Always on the road surviving in a strange foreign language, currently Mongolian and Mandarin Chinese.

And I collect dictionaries.
